speaker: DEPUTY RAY HOESE
line: Unit four-- I got a fire out on the horizon. Something burning out here at the 20-mile marker.

speaker: DISPATCHER
line: Unit four, confirmation of downed aircraft burning. All units, you've got a 10-13.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Unit four-- this is Detective Miles. I'm coming right at you, Ray. Now, you wait for backup before you head out, all right? Unit four-- come back, Deputy.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Deputy Hoese... Ray?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Oh, my God.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Lariat car rentals. Totals...

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Would you like to see the figure?

speaker: MULDER
line: Is that a lot?

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: A lot? Gas, expenses... the motel rooms alone. By FBI standards these numbers are out of control.

speaker: MULDER
line: We could start sharing rooms.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: You're under evaluation. There has to be a point when we say no.

speaker: MULDER
line: You can't really compare what we do to other departments in the Bureau.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Right. This business with aliens.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, there's more to it than that.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: But, at the end of the day you'd say aliens are your real focus.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's the reason I got started, yeah.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Investigating your sister's abduction and the government conspiracy around it. Both of which have been resolved, correct?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nothing has been resolved exactly.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: In this case report here it's concluded your sister is dead as well as the men who took her. This is your handwriting here on the report, Agent Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: So, what exactly is left to investigate?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Your release has been arranged.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Marita Covarrubias. The last time I saw you, I left you for dead.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Alex, if it was strictly up to me, I'd leave you here to rot, too.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: I see the money bleed out, but it just doesn't seem to make the results of your work any better. So many of the cases you investigate are left unexplained. Makes it hard to justify the expense.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So much of the work that we do cannot be measured in standard terms.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: How would you measure it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: We open doors with the X-Files, which lead to other doors.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Doors leading to... "A conspiracy of men who cooperated with alien beings to create human alien hybrids." So we could all become slaves of an alien invasion.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I believe that there was once a conspiracy. I believe I was taken by men who subjected me to medical tests, which gave me cancer and left me barren.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: But you don't believe in aliens?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I've seen things that I cannot deny.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Who sent you?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: The Smoking Man. He is dying.

speaker: MULDER
line: You said you were finished.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Turned in my report and was asked to go over a few things.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: As you know-- the times we live in-- the world is changing fast.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm missing your point.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: As I said, this is an evaluation, Agent Mulder to understand what you do. So, if you go forward, you can do so more responsibly.

speaker: MULDER
line: That sounds more like a threat.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Cost/benefit analysis. But, if you want the truth I really don't care one way or the other. You mostly record bizarre facts on bizarre cases. In other words, information gathering. Something, it seems to me you can easily do on the Internet.

speaker: MULDER
line: I can't do my job from an office, I promise you.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Nowadays, the most advanced space exploration is done sitting in an office, Agent Mulder. Why? It's just too damn expensive putting men in outer space.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm not looking in outer space.

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Bringing us to the point. If you spend so much time and money looking for aliens, responsibly, you should narrow your search.

speaker: MULDER
line: To where?

speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CHESTY SHORT
line: Wherever they are. It's not unreasonable. It's just a matter of reducing your vision.

speaker: RICHIE
line: Hey, you all right?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: What's the problem?

speaker: GARY
line: Isn't that your car, Mr. Miles?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Yeah. A small accident. Everything's all right. What are you boys doing out here?

speaker: RICHIE
line: Well, uh, we heard there was a plane crash-- military jet fighter collided midair with a UFO.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: The Navy found their plane about three miles away. We've seen no evidence of any other crash.

speaker: RICHIE
line: But we heard a sheriff say he saw a fire burning off the highway at the 20-mile mark.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: There's nothing out here. No fire. No sign of fire. You boys go on home. There's nothing to see here.

speaker: MULDER
line: I think I'm in big trouble.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, Mulder, how many times have they tried to shut us down?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, but I never actually assaulted an auditor before.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you hurt him?

speaker: MULDER
line: I reduced his vision a little bit.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: MALE VOICE
line: Agent Fox Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Speaking.

speaker: MALE VOICE
line: My name is Billy Miles. I don't know if you remember me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oregon, seven years ago. You had multiple abduction experiences. I'm here with Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Billy, are you all right?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Yeah. This may seem weird, me calling like this, but, um, I don't know where else to turn.

speaker: MULDER
line: It happening again, Billy?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Yeah, but not to me this time.

speaker: MULDER
line: More alien abductions, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know how we could possibly justify the expense.

speaker: MULDER
line: We'd probably turn up nothing.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Let's go waste some money.

speaker: NURSE GRETA
line: Hi. He's anxious to see you.

speaker: CSM
line: I was worried about you, Alex.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Cut the crap, old man.

speaker: CSM
line: I heard about your incarceration.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You had me thrown in that hellhole.

speaker: CSM
line: For trying to sell something that was mine, was it not? I hope we can all move forward... Put the past behind us. We have a... singular opportunity now.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: A singular opportunity?

speaker: CSM
line: There's been a crash in Oregon. An alien ship has collided with a military aircraft. Recovery is all-important. It's Roswell and Corona all over again-- 50 years later. It's our chance to rebuild the project.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: How do you know someone hasn't already recovered it?

speaker: CSM
line: It's never quite so easy.

speaker: RICHIE
line: I'm getting something here, Gary.

speaker: GARY
line: I told you, Richie.

speaker: RICHIE
line: Hey, man. Look at this.

speaker: RICHIE
line: Gary! Gary? RICHIE; Come on, man.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Agent Mulder and Agent Scully.

speaker: MULDER
line: Look who's wearing a badge.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: I've never thought of myself as a cop but it's been three years now. My dad got them to fudge the psych qualifications.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You're married, Billy.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Uh, divorced. I live back with my dad now.

speaker: MULDER
line: You've never, um... have you ever been able to get over the abductions?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Well, I have. But, um, people haven't. No one really believes it. My dad still denies it ever happened-- that any one of us was taken.

speaker: MULDER
line: Does he deny that it's happening now?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: There was a crash. A Navy pilot hit an unidentified aircraft outside of town. Now, the military found their jet but the other craft hasn't been recovered.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why not?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: It's our county and we're in charge of coordinating efforts but my dad has really been no help even though we have a deputy missing.

speaker: MULDER
line: You find the UFO and he won't be able to deny the truth.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: I hope that's all it is.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: What's going on, Bill?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Just talking to some people you might remember, Dad, from the FBI.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Scully, Agent Mulder.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: What brings you folks out here? You're not thinking this incident's some kind of UFO?

speaker: MULDER
line: Crash of an unidentified craft.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Well, I've been on with the FAA. You might want to follow up. Looks an awful lot like there was no crash at all.

speaker: MULDER
line: Deja vu all over again.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: That was there already in case you're wondering at all about it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I watched Agent Mulder paint that there seven years ago.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: What for?

speaker: MULDER
line: To mark an anomalous electrical disturbance-- the kind where time gets bent or goes missing or where your car loses power and dies in the middle of the road.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: These skid marks are mine.

speaker: MULDER
line: So, was the deputy's car up there sitting there without his lights on?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Well, if they'd been on, I would have seen him.

speaker: MULDER
line: Good point.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Detective? Did the, uh... deputy carry a .38?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: .38 super. Why?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Three shells were discharged. I image they could have rolled from up there.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: What was he shooting at?

speaker: MULDER
line: Probably nothing.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Nothing?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nothing's all you seem to find out here, Detective.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Was the missing deputy a good cop?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Yeah, sure, I guess.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Married? Single?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Bill! Come on over here with those!

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Married. New baby.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: You know, they only want to solve this.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Get in the car, Bill.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Yes?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sorry to bother you, Mrs. Hoese. We're with the FBI.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Is this about my husband?

speaker: MULDER
line: You're Teresa? Teresa Nemman?

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Yes.

speaker: MULDER
line: Seven years ago you came to Agent Scully and I for help. You were afraid of being abducted.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Oh, my God.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Please, come in.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: I'm sorry... I sort of lost it when I realized who you were.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We, uh... we came to see if there's anything that you could tell us that might help to find your husband.

speaker: MULDER
line: We had no idea you were his wife.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: I don't know if it's important. Maybe I just hope it's not but Ray and I have a connection that's even deeper for us.

speaker: MULDER
line: He's an abductee, too?

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: He kept it a secret from almost everyone. It doesn't make you real popular around here.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: His experiences were a lot more terrifying than mine. He was taken many times and tested. I have extensive medical records on him and photos of his scars. I'll get you the files.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you see?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you see?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Once upon a time there was a little baby.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who is it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's me.

speaker: MULDER
line: What's wrong, Scully? You look sick.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know what's wrong.

speaker: MULDER
line: Come in.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I, um... I was starting to get ready for bed and I started to feel really dizzy-- vertigo or something-- and then I just... I started to get chills.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want me to call a doctor?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, I just... I just want to get warm.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you.

speaker: MULDER
line: It's not worth it, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What?

speaker: MULDER
line: I want you to go home.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh, Mulder, I'm going to be fine.

speaker: MULDER
line: No, I've been thinking about it. Looking at you tonight, holding that baby... knowing everything that's been taken away from you. A chance for motherhood and your health and that baby. I think that... I don't know, maybe they're right.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who's right?

speaker: MULDER
line: The FBI. Maybe what they say is true, though for all the wrong reasons. It's the personal costs that are too high.

speaker: MULDER
line: There so much more you need to do with your life. There's so much more than this.

speaker: MULDER
line: There has to be an end, Scully.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: In spite of a great deal of effort no one seems to be able to find this UFO of yours.

speaker: CSM
line: Of course they can't.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You know why? 'Cause it's not here.

speaker: CSM
line: It's there, Alex. I'm certain of it. Hidden in plain sight.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You listen to me. If you're going to play games, the two of them, Mulder and Scully, they're going to beat me to it.

speaker: CSM
line: Are you saying that Mulder and Scully are there looking for the UFO?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: They're looking for a missing deputy.

speaker: CSM
line: Well, they're looking for the right thing but in the wrong place.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You sent me looking for a ship.

speaker: CSM
line: Find the deputy. Find the ship.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Who is it?

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Ray?

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Oh, my God. Oh, my God. I was so worried. I was so sure... what did they do to you this time?

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: Ray, talk to me.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: You're not my husband.

speaker: TERESA HOESE
line: No! No!

speaker: MULDER
line: What happened, Billy?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Teresa's gone. She's been taken, and they took her.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How do you know?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: The door was open.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully... the floor. What do you see?

speaker: MULDER
line: The same thing as out on the road. You've seen it before.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah. I have. We both have.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: What is it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's a biological toxin emitted as a gas through the bloodstream.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: From who?

speaker: SCULLY
line: From what is arguably an alien.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: You okay?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: You sure?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah, I'm fine, thanks.

speaker: CSM
line: Thank you, Greta.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Why the trouble? To bring Krycek here and then toy with him?

speaker: CSM
line: Do you trust Alex, Marita?

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Then why bring him here at all?

speaker: CSM
line: You misunderstand. I've great faith that Alex will find the ship. But if I told him how, he'd be... he'd be tempted to sell the information.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: And you're certain it's there?

speaker: CSM
line: Oh, yes. But it won't be there forever. It's rebuilding itself.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: If he finds the ship, then what?

speaker: CSM
line: To possess it is to possess the answer to all things. Every possible imaginable question.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: To God?

speaker: CSM
line: There's no God, Marita. What we call God is only alien-- an intelligence much greater than us.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: They're coming here, aren't they?

speaker: CSM
line: They're only coming back.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey. Hey, what are you doing?

speaker: RICHIE
line: I was just standing there. Is that against the law?

speaker: MULDER
line: You know this guy?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Yeah. What are you doing, Richie?

speaker: RICHIE
line: They took him, Billy. They took Gary. He was just gone.

speaker: MULDER
line: Relax. Slow down.

speaker: RICHIE
line: They're out there. I don't care what your dad says, Billy.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: My dad?

speaker: RICHIE
line: He was out there, too. He knows.

speaker: RICHIE
line: I was shining my flashlight in the dark looking for the UFO and uh, the beam hit this spot in space-- like it bent the light.

speaker: MULDER
line: And then what happened?

speaker: RICHIE
line: Well, I yelled, "Gary!" And I looked... but he wasn't there, you know? He wasn't anywhere, man and then the flashlight got really hot and I dropped it. It's right around here somewhere.

speaker: RICHIE
line: Oh, hey, here it is.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully?

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully?

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want some water?

speaker: RICHIE
line: What happened to her?

speaker: MULDER
line: Can you just get her some water?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I just... I just... I just hit the ground.

speaker: MULDER
line: Here, lie still.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why is this happening to me?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's okay. It's okay.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What the hell's going on, Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know. But these aren't just random abductions, Scully. We've got to warn Billy Miles of that.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Warn him of what?

speaker: MULDER
line: These abductees aren't just systematically being taken. They're not coming back.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: Dad?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Billy... what are you doing?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: You stay where you are.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Billy, it's me.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: I said, stay where you are!

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: Damn it, Billy, listen to me.

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: No. I don't know who you are but you are not going to take me.

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: I'm your father. Are you going to shoot your father?

speaker: BILLY MILES
line: If you're my father... then why won't you believe me?

speaker: DETECTIVE MILES
line: I believe you, Billy. I just want it all to go away. Give me the gun, son.

speaker: MULDER
line: Billy?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Billy?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: What's our punishment this time? Thumbscrews or 40 lashes? Come on in, Walter. Sit a spell. This could be the last time you take a trip down to these offices.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You went to Oregon.

speaker: MULDER
line: Guilty as charged. And if they're coming down on you for that, then I'm sorry. I truly am.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Fortunately, they think that I make a contribution to the Bureau.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh well yeah, stick to a budget they say your making a contribution, but push the limits of your profession, and they say you're out of control.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You could bring home a flying saucer and have an alien shake hands with the President … what it comes down to Agent Mulder is … they don't like you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, we didn't bring home a flying saucer … or an alien.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yeah … so I've been told.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder! I think you should listen to him.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: You've got every reason to want to see me dead. But you've got to listen to me now. You have the singular opportunity.

speaker: MULDER
line: Here or you want to step outside.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: Agent Mulder. CancerMan is dying.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: His last wish is to rebuild his Project, to have us revive the Conspiracy. It all begins in Oregon.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: The ship that collided with that Navy plane. It's in those woods.

speaker: MULDER
line: There's no ship in those woods.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Yeah, it's there. Cloaked in an energy field. Great, mops up the evidence.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: The Alien Bounty Hunter. Billy Miles. Teresa Hoese, her husband. He's eliminating proof of all the tests. We're asking ourselves, we're asking ourselves, "Where are they?" They're right there. They're right under our noses. I'm giving you the chance to change that, to hold the proof.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why me and why now

speaker: KRYCEK
line: I want to damn the soul of that Cigarette Smoking Son-of-a-Bitch.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder?

speaker: FROHIKE
line: What's amazing is that even the military satellites don't see it.

speaker: LANGLEY
line: But J.P.L.'S Topex Poseidon shows it only as waveform data.

speaker: BYERS
line: And here it appears simply as a microburst of transmission error on the European Space Agency's ERS-2.

speaker: SKINNER
line: In other words?

speaker: FROHIKE
line: In other words, you'd never know it's a UFO.

speaker: BYERS
line: If you didn't know what you were looking at or looking for.

speaker: LANGLEY
line: No wonder we couldn't see them.

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Listen, it is not going to be there forever.

speaker: MARITA COVARRUBIAS
line: As we all stand here talking it's rebuilding itself.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, if any of this is true...

speaker: MULDER
line: If it is, or if it isn't I want you to forget about it, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Forget about it?

speaker: MULDER
line: You're not going back out there. I'm not going to let you go back out there.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: MULDER
line: It has to end sometime. That time is now.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, you have to understand that they're taking abductees. You're an abductee. I'm not going to risk...

speaker: MULDER
line: …. losing you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I won't let you go alone.

speaker: SKINNER
line: This is starting to feel like the snipe hunt I was afraid of.

speaker: MULDER
line: There's no such thing as a snipe, sir.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Hey, you know, my ass is on the line here, too, Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: I know that.

speaker: SCULLY
line: This just can't be.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: What are you looking at?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Medical records-- Billy Miles and other known abductees in Bellefleur, Oregon. They all experienced anomalous brain activity.

speaker: BYERS
line: Electro-encephalitic trauma.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Which is exactly what Mulder experienced earlier this year.

speaker: LANGLEY
line: I don't understand.

speaker: SCULLY
line: There was something out there in that field. It knocked me back. Because it didn't want me. Mulder thinks that it's me that's in danger of being taken.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: When it's Mulder who's in danger.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Scully?

speaker: GUNMEN
line: Scully! Whoa! You okay? Oh, gee.

speaker: SKINNER
line: How's it supposed to work?

speaker: MULDER
line: Not exactly sure, sir. But, uh...

speaker: MULDER
line: … budgetarily, I'd say we're looking pretty good.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder?!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder!

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder! Mulder...

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder.

speaker: CSM
line: We've failed, then. Perhaps you never meant to succeed. Anyway... the hour is at hand, I presume.

speaker: NURSE GRETA
line: What are you doing?

speaker: KRYCEK
line: Sending the Devil back to Hell.

speaker: CSM
line: As you do to Mulder and to me... you do to all of mankind, Alex.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hi.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Hi. How you feeling?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm feeling fine. They're just running some tests on me.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Well... um...

speaker: SCULLY
line: I already heard.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I lost him. I don't know what else I can say. I lost him. I'll be asked... what I saw. And what I saw, I can't deny. I won't.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We will find him. I have to.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir, um... there's something else I need to tell you. Something that I need for you to keep to yourself.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm having a hard time explaining it. Or believing it. But, um...

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm pregnant.
